metadata.color: diamond color from J (worst) to D (best)
metadata.clarity: measure of diamond clarity (from left to right is worst to best: I1, SI2, SI1, VS2, VS1, VVS2, VVS1, IF)
metadata.depth: percentage depth that is equal to z / mean(x,y)
metadata.table: width of the widest point at the top of the diamond
